thread.section_title: DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel New York City - Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect Location
thread.title_full: Perfect Location - Review of DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel New York City - Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: OttawaCurler
title: Perfect Location
text: Great location which is close to theatre and restaurants. You can walk to anything you could ever need. Reasonable price for a fairly large suite. Hotel a bit tired however the staff and the location make up for any shortfalls. Ask for a room overlooking the square means you are close to the elevator however it is a great once in a life time experience.
